ValidationRule.description: Ensures listing price is reasonable compared to market value
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Listing_price__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Market_value__c)), OR( Listing_price__c > (Market_value__c * 1.5), Listing_price__c < (Market_value__c * 0.5) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Listing price should be within 50% of market value. Please verify pricing.
